data.title: Time Traveler Film! 'PERIYANDAVAR' starring YogiBabu playing as lord shiva is produced and directed by R.Kannan. - Tamil News
data.meta_description: Time Traveler Film!'PERIYANDAVAR' starring YogiBabu playing as lord shiva is produced and directed by R.Kannan.
data.meta_site_name: Tamil News | Online Tamilnadu News | Tamil Cinema News | Chennai News | Chennai Power shutdown Today | Chennai Vision
data.text:
R.Kannan who completed directing films ‘The Great Indian Kitchen’ starring Aishwarya Rajesh and ‘Kasethan Kadavulada’ starring Mirchi Siva is working on the process of releasing these films.

YogiBabu is potraying as Lord Shiva and playing the lead role.This is a time traveller film.The film will be in a different genre and it will be in the list of yogi babu’s well known films like Kolamavu Kokila,Gurkha ,Dharma Prabhu,Mandela.The Audition for the female lead and other cast members is going on and the shoot is planned to start after the summer ends.

As YogiBabu is playing the role of Shiva,A shivan temple set will be erected at a cost of 50 lakhs in the ECR.

As the film is mainly focused on the dialogues ,Kabilan Vairamuthu has been roped as the lyricist and dialogue writer along with R.Kannan.As the story is about both shivan and time traveller, a famous mumbai based company is in talks for CG and Graphics work.Masala Pix is producing the film as thier 9th film.

Camera: Chelladhurai (Thiruttu payale2,Rowdy baby) Lyrics & Dialogue: Kabilan Vairamuthu Editor: Suriya Art: Rajkumar Stunt: Stunt Silva PRO: Johnson

#Periyandavar starring @iYogiBabu is an upcoming time traveller film Produced & directed by @Dir_kannanR. Film will be a different genre, Director R.Kannan who known for his films like JayamKondaan,Kanden Kadhalai,Ivan Thanthiran ,Boomerang, Thallipogathey is now directing his 12th film titled as “PERIYANDAVAR”.

R.Kannan who completed directing films ‘The Great Indian Kitchen’ starring Aishwarya Rajesh and ‘Kasethan Kadavulada’ starring Mirchi Siva is working on the process of releasing these films.

YogiBabu is potraying as Lord Shiva and playing the lead role.This is a time traveller film.The film will be in a different genre and it will be in the list of yogi babu’s well known films like Kolamavu Kokila,Gurkha ,Dharma Prabhu,Mandela.The Audition for the female lead and other cast members is going on and the shoot is planned to start after the summer ends.

As YogiBabu is playing the role of Shiva,A shivan temple set will be erected at a cost of 50 lakhs in the ECR.

As the film is mainly focused on the dialogues ,Kabilan Vairamuthu has been roped as the lyricist and dialogue writer along with R.Kannan.As the story is about both shivan and time traveller, a famous mumbai based company is in talks for CG and Graphics work.Masala Pix is producing the film as thier 9th film.

Camera: Chelladhurai (Thiruttu payale2,Rowdy baby) Lyrics & Dialogue: Kabilan Vairamuthu Editor: Suriya Director R.Kannan who known for his films like JayamKondaan,Kanden Kadhalai,Ivan Thanthiran,Boomerang, Thallipogathey is now directing his 12th film titled as “PERIYANDAVAR”.
